alert.note: Alert for Garland; Hot Spring (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 11 at 11:03PM CDT until March 11 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CST FOR SOUTH CENTRAL GARLAND AND NORTHEASTERN HOT SPRING COUNTIES... At 1002 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Malvern, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Hot Springs... Malvern... Rockport... Perla... Magnet Cove... Red Oak... De Roche... Lake Catherine State Park... Social Hill... Gifford... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
